author: guitargeek
body:
Hi,

in the discussions to PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24432 we decided to put the weight files translated to XML in the cms-data repository.

Using exclusively the XML format for BDTs in CMSSW saves us from maintaining different parsers for both the text based and XML format, while losing no information whatsoever.

Depends on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24432 because right now CMSSW would not be able to detect the gzip.

Jonas
title: Translated BDT weight files to xml and gzipped them
